title: Installation issue: cmake
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
> spack -d install -j 1 cmake
 error found in build log:
     953    [ 99%] Built target pseudo_cpplint
     954    [ 99%] Built target pseudo_tidy
     955    [100%] Built target pseudo_cppcheck
     956    [100%] Built target foo
     957    Install the project...
     958    bin/cmake: /usr/lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.22' not found (required by bin/cmake)
  >> 959    make: *** [install] Error 1

See build log for details:
  /gpfs/work/pn56se/di29veb4/software/spack/var/spack/stage/cmake-3.13.4-d7wsnjfuyw62okivfnlvsotdpzo366m5/cmake-3.13.4/spack-build.out
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/gpfs/work/pn56se/di29veb4/software/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_environment.py", line 731, in child_process
    return_value = function()
  File "/gpfs/work/pn56se/di29veb4/software/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py", line 1491, in build_process
    phase(self.spec, self.prefix)
  File "/gpfs/work/pn56se/di29veb4/software/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py", line 101, in phase_wrapper
    phase(spec, prefix)
  File "/gpfs/work/pn56se/di29veb4/software/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/cmake/package.py", line 145, in install
  File "/gpfs/work/pn56se/di29veb4/software/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_environment.py", line 127, in __call__
    return super(MakeExecutable, self).__call__(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/gpfs/work/pn56se/di29veb4/software/spack/lib/spack/spack/util/executable.py", line 188, in __call__
    proc.returncode, long_msg)
spack.util.executable.ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' 'install'

```

### Platform and user environment
```commandline
> uname -a
Linux login23 3.0.101-108.77-default #1 SMP Mon Oct 1 13:13:39 UTC 2018 (4733e02) x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

> lsb_release -d
Description:    SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 11 (x86_64)
``` 
- `packages.yaml`: not modified
- `compilers.yaml`: not modifiert

to the issue

### Additional information

Rebuilding the package with the following options:
```console
$ spack -d install -j 1 cmake
```
[spack-cc-cmake-d7wsnjf.in.log](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/2856649/spack-cc-cmake-d7wsnjf.in.log)
[spack-cc-cmake-d7wsnjf.out.log](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/2856650/spack-cc-cmake-d7wsnjf.out.log)
